tests.description: Verify Playwright is installed and browsers are available
Verify Playwright config has all 5 projects defined
Verify e2e-services.sh and e2e-check-services.sh exist and are executable
tests.command: cd ../trip-planner-web && test -x scripts/e2e-services.sh && test -x scripts/e2e-check-services.sh && bash -n scripts/e2e-services.sh && bash -n scripts/e2e-check-services.sh

tests.storyTitle: Set up Playwright MCP for Claude Code
tests.description: Verify Playwright MCP is configured in yopki-dev .mcp.json

tests.storyTitle: Create e2e directory structure and example tests
tests.description: Verify e2e directories exist, HomePage page object exists, smoke test passes, and .gitignore has Playwright entries
tests.command: cd ../trip-planner-web && test -d e2e/desktop && test -d e2e/mobile && test -d e2e/shared && test -d e2e/fixtures && test -d e2e/page-objects && test -f e2e/page-objects/HomePage.ts && test -f e2e/shared/navigation.spec.ts && grep -q 'test-results' .gitignore && npx playwright test --project=desktop-chromium e2e/shared/navigation.spec.ts

tests.storyTitle: Update CLAUDE.md with mandatory e2e testing rules
tests.description: Verify CLAUDE.md has E2E Testing section with TDD rules, test locations, commands, and page object reference
tests.command: cd /home/lcc/yopki/yopki-dev && grep -q 'E2E Testing (Mandatory)' CLAUDE.md && grep -q 'strict TDD' CLAUDE.md && grep -q 'e2e/desktop/' CLAUDE.md && grep -q 'test:e2e' CLAUDE.md && grep -q 'page-objects/' CLAUDE.md

tests.storyTitle: Update dev.md command with TDD workflow phases
tests.description: Verify dev.md has E2E Test Plan section, Write E2E Tests phase, Verify phase, and strict TDD rules
tests.command: cd /home/lcc/yopki/yopki-dev && grep -q 'E2E Test Plan' .claude/commands/dev.md && grep -q 'Write E2E Tests' .claude/commands/dev.md && grep -q 'Verify (TDD' .claude/commands/dev.md && grep -q 'Strict TDD' .claude/commands/dev.md

tests.description: Verify e2e-testing.md exists and covers Playwright syntax, Page Object Model, MCP usage, auth fixtures, mobile vs desktop, and debugging
tests.command: cd /home/lcc/yopki/yopki-dev && test -f .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Playwright Test Syntax' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Page Object Model' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Playwright MCP' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Auth Fixtures' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Mobile vs Desktop' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md && grep -q 'Debugging' .claude/docs/e2e-testing.md
